bm_desc: Intimation for Separate Meeting of Independent Directors to be held on Tuesday, March 11, 2025.

Meeting of Asset and Liability Management Committee scheduled on Tuesday, March 11, 2025 to consider raising of funds by way of issuance of Secured, Redeemable, Non-Convertible Debentures denominated in Indian Rupees ("INR") on private placement basis
To consider declaration of distribution, if any, to be paid to unitholders for the period ended January, 2025 and February, 2025
To consider and declare 2nd Interim Dividend, if any, for the Financial Year 2024-25.
Intimation for separate meeting of the Independent Directors
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2024
Board Meeting to be held on Thursday, March 13, 2025
To consider Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2024-25.
To consider Fund Raising by way of Lond Term Infrastructure Bonds
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended March 31, 2025
To consider and approve the audited financial results for the period ended March 31, 2025 and dividend
